author: belforte
body:
Dear Diego and Bruno
this is new Crabclient for 1511 release to be put in CVMFS
This is the first time I do this, covering for Marco who is away.
I am not sure what is the recommended way to communicate that this is for production rather than pre, i.e. that it will be accessed via `/cvmfs/cms.cern.ch/crab3/crab.sh` rather than
`/cvmfs/cms.cern.ch/crab3/crab_pre.sh`

On the substance, there is no chance from previous tag made by Marco, which was tested, so this PR should be safe.
title: crabclient for Nov 2015 release
